feed.title: IndustryBestPractice Blog
feed.subtitle: A blog bourne from trying to convince a director that rotating passwords every 90 days is not an "industry best practice" today just becausee it was 10 years ago.

entry.title: Welcome to IndustryBestPractice!
entry.content: This is the first post page for the IndustryBestPractice blog. The blog will likely be changing as I have time to get it setup, but this this my first attempt at blogging using Jekyll and Github Pages. Hopefully I apply a theme soon, though I kind of like the spartan nature of minima.
